mapper.select: select o.order_id, o.cart_id, o.item_id, o.quantity, o.size_id, o.user_id, o.placed_at, isz.size, i.item_name, o.updated_at, o.status from order_table o LEFT JOIN inventory_sizes isz on o.size_id = isz.size_id LEFT JOIN inventory i on o.item_id = i.item_id where user_id = #{userId};
SELECT comment_id FROM item_comment WHERE item_id = #{itemId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_comment_index (item_id, comment_id, user_id, type) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{commentId}, #{userId}, #{type})
INSERT INTO review_details (index_id, placed_at, quantity, item_name, size_name) VALUES (#{indexId}, #{placedAt}, #{quantity}, #{itemName}, #{sizeName})
